title: Can we start a Collection for the Author of this Post

embed.description: A deep-dive into League's design philosophy of focusing on deep, core gameplay over accessibility.

body:
I would like to pass the hat around to get some money together for the author of the above post. I am guessing that English is not their first language, as the English in this post is atrocious. 

We could send the author on a top tier ESL (English as a second Language) to help the author out. Maybe if we had some money left over we could buy an electronic dictionary for the author, as well as computer training in the use of MS Word and it's features in terms of both spell checking and Grammar.

Anyway it was just a thought. I would hate for the author to continue to embarrass themselves any further.

Best of luck.

replies.body: Do you have any specific feedback on the article that you'd like me to pass forward to the team?
